name: Pox
description:
Pox: A Tale of Havoc 

Forge your own path in “Pox”. An epic action adventure through the medieval ages, full of test subjects in which you can try your newly developed plague. 

Explore a town and taint their food and water, battle the townsfolk and embrace the plague,  all in a classic, hand-drawn 2D style. As a Plague Doctor, you have developed the most deadly of plagues known to mankind. With it, you must wreak havoc and despair to Blighton, a nearby town. Whilst adapting against everything they can throw at you!. Good luck!!

Technology Notes:

  • Made with Unity, passion and love.
  •  Animated with Adobe Photoshop
  • Vissual Assets made with Adobe tools and other minor tools
  • Sound effects and music made with Ableton Live
